product_name: Primus BrewFire Dual-Fuel Coffee Maker - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When camping trips take you into new, unfamiliar places, bring the taste of home-brewed coffee with the Primus BrewFire Dual-Fuel coffee maker. Works just like your coffeemaker at home except it runs on propane or butane fuel. Simple and easy to operate-just pour in your coffee grounds, add water, turn the knob and flip a switch to start brewing. Stainless-steel carafe holds up to 8 cups of steaming coffee; carafe keeps coffee hot for 2.5 hrs.; ABS plastic surrounding structure is durable and easy to clean. Takes approximately 10 - 12 min. to brew 8 cups of coffee. Operates on 16.4 oz. propane canisters or 4 oz. - 16 oz. butane canisters, not included. Closeout.
short_description: When camping trips take you into new, unfamiliar places, bring the taste of home-brewed coffee with the Primus BrewFire Dual-Fuel coffee maker.
